title: Here is a list of 20 articles, up to 2024, that focus on methods to integrate societal-level factors into the analysis of Natural Language Processing (NLP) models. These articles cover a range of topics including bias, fairness, ethics, and the impact of societal norms on NLP
**"Fairness and Abstraction in Sociotechnical Systems"** - Selbst
**"Mitigating Unwanted Biases with Adversarial Learning"**
**"Gender Bias in Contextualized Word Embeddings"** - Zhao, Jieyu, et al
**"Dissecting Racial Bias in an Algorithm that Guides Health Decisions for 70 Million People"** - Obermeyer, Ziad, et al
**"On the Dangers of Stochastic Parrots: Can Language Models Be Too Big?"** - Bender
**"Towards a Metric of Bias in Translation Systems"** - Prates
**"The Role of Social Bias in Opinion Dynamics: A Simulation Approach"** - Lorenz-Spreen, Philipp, et al
**"Bias in Bios: A Case Study of Semantic Representation Bias in a High-Stakes Setting"** - De-Arteaga, Maria, et al
**"Analyzing Gender Bias within Narrative Tropes"** - Sap, Maarten, et al
**"Measuring and Mitigating Unintended Bias in Text Classification"**
**"Social Bias Frames: Reasoning about Social and Power Implications of Language"** - Sap, Maarten, et al
**"Ethical Considerations in NLP Research: Risks and Recommendations"**
**"The Moral Authority of Statistical Learning"**
**"Bias in NLP Models: A Survey and Future Directions"** - Blodgett, Su Lin, et al

author.literal: **"Debiasing Word Embeddings"** - Bolukbasi, Tolga, et al.

title: **"Fairness in Machine Learning: A Survey"** - Mehrabi, Ninareh, et al
**"Algorithmic Bias Detection and Mitigation: Best Practices and Policies to Reduce Consumer Harms"** - U.S
**"Understanding Unintended Ethical Concerns in AI Systems"**
**"Ethical Implications of NLP Models: A Critical Review"**
**"Integrating Societal Norms into NLP Models: Challenges and Opportunities"**

These articles should provide a comprehensive overview of the current state of research on integrating societal-level factors into NLP models. They cover various methodologies, case studies, and theoretical discussions that can help you understand the complexities and challenges in this area
